metadata.title: CVE-2021-3798 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in openCryptoki. The openCryptoki Soft token does notcheck if an EC key is valid when an EC key is created via C_CreateObject,nor when C_DeriveKey is used with ECDH public data. This may allow amalicious user to extract the private key by performing an invalid curveattack.

criterions.comment: opencryptoki package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
